senses.sense_definition: Acting to inhibit the function or accumulation of blood platelets, usually to prevent blood clots.

examples.text: The doctor recommended <w>antiplatelet</w> therapy to reduce the risk of another heart attack.
He takes an <w>antiplatelet</w> medication every morning to keep his blood thin.

senses.sense_definition: A drug or substance that prevents blood platelets from clumping together.

examples.text: Aspirin is one of the most commonly used <w>antiplatelets</w> available without a prescription.
The patient was prescribed two different <w>antiplatelets</w> to ensure no clots would form.
